heading: 2024 Annual Planning Guide Released
summary: The Curiosity Chronicle offers a comprehensive 2024 Annual Planning Guide to help individuals set and achieve their goals, featuring frameworks for goal-setting, system-building, and progress tracking. Includes a 30-for-30 approach, minimum viable progress strategy, and downloadable templates.

heading: Exclusive Athletic Greens Offer
summary: Athletic Greens is offering a free 1-year supply of liquid vitamin D and 5 travel packs with subscriptions. This limited-time offer provides essential nutrients for overall health and wellness.

heading: Curiosity Chronicle Rewards Program
summary: Sahil Bloom's newsletter introduces a rewards program for referrals. Subscribers can earn exclusive ebooks, merchandise, and a one-on-one call by referring others, with rewards starting at just 1 referral.
